medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started 2 hours after dinner yesterday and has been increasing since then. The pain is dull in nature but becomes sharp when the right abdomen is palpated. Pain medications in the ED provided relief. The patient also complains of yellow/brown vomit x1 and some chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Endometriosis; numerous laparoscopic procedures for endometriosis; Bartholin's cyst removal.
